item.title: Runescape shutting down? open sorce :s?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:9, topic:433458”]you understand the thread is from august 2011 right?[/quote]24-Aug-2011 20:08:38 Last edited on 20-Feb-2012 04:22:17 by Louiellen
He just updated it today…

[quote=“XxraidersxX, post:5, topic:433458”]so there going to allow rsps?[/quote]

Like Firefox’s Mozilla foundation: this small non-profit firm (Gielinor Foundation, to be abbreviated GF for short [no pun intended] for the remaining parts of this thread) will maintain Runescape’s Opensource code and coordinate all updates to it from the wide community of volunteer developers. Of course, the sourcecode will be under the GPL licensing agreement, anybody can use the code to produce their own version of Runescape and host it on their own hardware. But those that will choose to do so, are mandated to give back their changes to GF for inclusion to the main Runescape code tree.

(later on on page 7)
Though, this will open-up the possibility for someone to just get his/her own Runescape version running and self-hosted legally.

Although, as much as I wish this was true, I’m sure is a load of bull shit…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape shutting down? open sorce :s?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“megahost, post:16, topic:433458”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=536178.msg3921457#msg3921457 date=1329756551]

Thread is from 2010 as already stated by other genius members of mopar but

http://www.google.com/trends/?q=runescape

just proves that people aren’t into games that take any amount of “work” anymore, when I was 12 I loved runescape, now my nephew who is 12 prefers acting tough on Xbox, world is changing. personally I’d love for runescape to shut down its plagued with one of the worst communities i have ever seen and its learning curve is to fucking steep for new players anymore.

^^FALSE,because all games requiring working to achieve something. Personally runescape should not even think about shutting down they worked to hard in what they did. And still have a big population of still active players. I will agree the community it’s horrible. And it’s not what the players want anymore it’s about what jagex wants now but when it all comes down to it you can kind of relate it to the real world. For example, noobs asking for money would be like a hobo standing somewhere with a sign doing it, scammers would be like drug dealers. I don’t see how its hard for new players it shows you what to do and there’s an arrow that points to where you should go on the minimap. A game is always going to be challenging.
[/quote]runescape is gay anyway ide love to see it shut down[/quote]
Say why you want it shut down. Because it’s “Gay” isn’t a valid reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape shutting down? open sorce :s?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:433458”]Just shut up please, it’s not going down, it’s not open source, if it ever does go down, it wont be released. That was just a mod stating what he thinks would happen. Player mods know no more about the game then regular players (other then updates to the player moderator commands). RuneScape makes $6 a month times 500,000 paying users, I think that’s worth it for them for updating once a month with a half assed quest.[/quote]I wonder how much information I could pull out of my ass at once… I doubt I could ever beat this The only completely correct statement in here was the second sentence. Not saying I support the OP though. Clearly a pointless incorrect topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape shutting down? open sorce :s?
item.dc:creator: @suber_man suber man
item.description:
@suber_man wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:433458”]Just shut up please, it’s not going down, it’s not open source, if it ever does go down, it wont be released. That was just a mod stating what he thinks would happen. Player mods know no more about the game then regular players (other then updates to the player moderator commands). RuneScape makes $6 a month times 500,000 paying users, I think that’s worth it for them for updating once a month with a half assed quest.

Note: This entire thread is discussion based on a theoretical & hypothetical scenarios. Although anything is possible in today’s modern world, the contents of this thread posted by the thread author are purely a product of her imagination. This thread is neither Pro-Jagex or Anti-Jagex, flaming and uncivilised arguments of any kind is strictly prohibited. Also post done “just for the luls” are not allowed, the author wishes for this to be a healthy exchange of imagination, wit and ideas for a theoretical post-Jagex Runescape.

agreed with this.^^[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape shutting down? open sorce :s?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Just shut up please, it’s not going down, it’s not open source, if it ever does go down, it wont be released. That was just a mod stating what he thinks would happen. Player mods know no more about the game then regular players (other then updates to the player moderator commands). RuneScape makes $6 a month times 500,000 paying users, I think that’s worth it for them for updating once a month with a half assed quest.

Note: This entire thread is discussion based on a theoretical & hypothetical scenarios. Although anything is possible in today’s modern world, the contents of this thread posted by the thread author are purely a product of her imagination. This thread is neither Pro-Jagex or Anti-Jagex, flaming and uncivilised arguments of any kind is strictly prohibited. Also post done “just for the luls” are not allowed, the author wishes for this to be a healthy exchange of imagination, wit and ideas for a theoretical post-Jagex Runescape.

Read full topic
